meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The arnica in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked some arnica to add color to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the arnica in the field.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the arnica in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The arnica's petals danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from the dried flower heads of the arnica plant, used in herbal medicine for its anti-inflammatory properties.
meanings.sent1: The arnica ointment helped soothe her sore muscles.
meanings.sent2: He applied arnica gel to reduce the swelling.
meanings.sent3: The arnica cream smelled surprisingly pleasant.
meanings.sent4: Her recovery was as quick as the arnica's healing power.
meanings.sent5: The arnica remedy worked wonders on his bruises.
